Pascal Karibe Ojigwe (amụrụ na 11 Disemba 1976) bụ onye Naijiria bụbu onye na-agba bọọlụ, nke na-agba dịka onye na-echebe ebe azụ, ma ọ bụ onye na-eme ihe n'etiti. O nwekwara nwa amaala Germany.
A mụrụ Ojigwe na Aba, Naịjirịa.Akụkụ ọwụwa anyanwụ nke Naijiria
Ojigwe gara ịgbazinye ego site na 1
FC Kaiserslautern gaa n'ọkwa nke abụọ 1

Ojigwe jụrụ ịlaghachi na klọb mbụ ya, ma kama ọ kwagara na onye sonyere na Champions League Bayer 04 Leverkusen, maka ego mbufe nke e kwenyere na ọ bụ, DM 3.5 nde (ihe dị ka € 1.75 nde) N'oge mbufe ahụ enwere nnukwu esemokwu ọha na eze n'etiti ndị njikwa Köln na Leverkusan, Johannes Linßen na Reiner Calmund.
